GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.4.207
GSD.description:
cgroup: Use separate src/dst nodes when preloading css_sets for migration

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.207 by commit ad44e05f3e016bdcb1ad25af35ade5b5f41ccd68, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit f817de98513d060023be4fa1d061b29a6515273e. For more details please see the references link.
